entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 09:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: WNW 42 km/h gust 55 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Fog dissipating early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
